abort.already_configured: This GeoRide account is already configured

init.title: GeoRide Trips Options
init.description: Configure real-time connection and update intervals.

data_description.socketio_enabled: Enables real-time GPS position, motion detection, and alerts (theft, fall). Requires python-socketio installed.
data_description.tracker_scan_interval: Update frequency for tracker status: battery, eco mode, lock, and network state. Minimum 60s, default 300s (5 min).
data_description.scan_interval: Update frequency for recent trips. Minimum 300s (5 min), default 3600s (1h).
data_description.lifetime_scan_interval: Update frequency for total mileage. Minimum 3600s (1h), default 86400s (24h).
data_description.trips_days_back: Number of days to fetch for recent trips. Default: 30 days.
data_description.gps_min_accuracy: Maximum accepted GPS accuracy radius in meters. Positions with a larger radius are ignored. 0 = disabled (all positions accepted). Example: 50 = ignore positions with accuracy > 50m.
